statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE email = 'user@example.com';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, settings FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username,email,date_joined FROM user_accounts WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username,settings->'theme' AS theme FROM user_accounts WHERE settings->'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT user_id,username,email,settings FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM settings WHERE unit_system = 'metric';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM settings WHERE unit_system = 'imperial';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts
SELECT display_name, timezone, theme FROM user_settings
SELECT data_id, date, steps, calories_burned FROM fitness_data
SELECT user_id, display_name, theme FROM user_settings
SELECT data_id, user_id, calories_burned, distance_km FROM fitness_data
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, password_hash FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT display_name, timezone FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, date, steps, calories_burned FROM fitness_data WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme, notification_enabled FROM user_settings WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT workout_name, duration, calories_burned FROM workouts ORDER BY calories_burned DESC;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, target_value, progress FROM goals WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT theme, notification_enable FROM user_settings WHERE theme = 'dark' AND notification_enable = true;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT u.username, g.goal_name, g.target_value FROM users u JOIN goals g ON u.user_id = g.user_id;
SELECT w.workout_name, u.username, w.duration, w.calories_burned FROM workouts w JOIN users u ON w.user_id = u.user_id WHERE w.duration > 30 ORDER BY w.calories_burned DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE height > 170;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE weight < 70;
SELECT username, age, height FROM users WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_workouts WHERE reps >= 10 ORDER BY sets ASC, reps DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT workouts.date, workouts.duration, exercises.exercise_name FROM workouts INNER JOIN user_workouts ON workouts.workout_id = user_workouts.workout_id INNER JOIN exercises ON user_workouts.exercise_id = exercises.exercise_id;

SELECT users.username, SUM(workouts.calories_burned) AS total_calories_burned FROM users INNER JOIN workouts ON users.user_id = workouts.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_calories_burned DESC;
